Zachary J. Leonardo

Full Stack Software Developer

Hello, welcome to my website! I'm currently studying for my bachelors degree in Computer Science at Allegheny College. I've been fascinated by computers my entire life, so computer science was an obvious fit.

I am currently employeed at Geisinger Medical Center as a foodservice worker and have been for the last 2 years. As an occasional B-code lead I am responsible for supervising the processes and food service team on a daily basis. I am also on the executive board for Gator Activities Programming as the current VP of Internal Operations.

Intrests & Goals:

  • I am currently interested in software development and testing with Python and Pytest.

  • I plan on practicing test driven devlopment with both Python and Java, and expanding my knowledge of mutation testing.

  • This summer I hope to secure an software engineering internship or contribute to software development research projects.

Current Projects:

  • GatorGrader

    I contributed to the GatorGrader automatic assessment tool built and maintatined by students and faculty at Allegheny College. As part of the CMPSC 481 Software Innovation course we were tasked with enhancing the software with LaTeX integration. This was challenging for me and my team, since it was the first time we were exposed to the GatorGrader source code. After 6 weeks of development we implemented fully functional and completly tested regular expression checking as well as a LaTeX sample assignment.
